description: The R1® Air Zip-Neck is a lightweight, breathable and quick-drying technical fleece for high-exertion activities in cold conditions. Fabric is made with 100% recycled polyester and is structured for comfort during movement.
name: Patagonia R1 Air Zip Neck - Mens

specs.value: 5.7-oz 100% recycled polyester jacquard fleece with hollow-core yarns
